TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but now you're blind to all but tachyons.

I wish for negative energy densities to be achievable on a meaningful scale.

Negative energy densities are now achievable on a meaningful scale. This, surprisingly, does next to nothing to the universe. Mankind thinks that it has its path to the stars paved for it. However, negative energy densities turn out to be afraid of humans, and decide to hide inside of jupiter. Which is never seen again.

I wish for a fish that doesn't kill me or ruin my life.
I wish to go to Dres.

Granted, but without a space suit

I wish to be a cat

You become a cat, but lose a person-like qualities, meaning you are just a house cat and nothing more.

I wish that my grades didn't sink through the floor.

Granted. They now take the floor with them as they sink rapidly, and you fall to the center of Earth.

I wish for a space-grade rover.

Granted. You receive someone's pet dog named "Rover". He's in a space suit.

 

I wish for work to end soon

Work is cancelled when a small black hole zips past the Moon, sending it on an impact trajectory with Earth. Both shatter into molten globs of rock which become a debris field.

I wish I could control where the clouds go.

Edited March 30, 2016 by cubinator

unable to process : "NULL"

I wish school was cancelled.

1 minute ago, Joshwoo69 said:

unable to process : "NULL"

I wish school was cancelled.

School is cancelled when a small black hole zips past the Moon, sending it on an impact trajectory with Earth. Both shatter into molten globs of rock which become a debris field.

I wish I could control where the clouds go.

Granted.

Unfortunately, though you control where clouds go, you do not control where lightning strikes, and you vaporize yourself.

I wish someone would quote this post.

1 hour ago, Mjp1050 said:

Granted.

Unfortunately, though you control where clouds go, you do not control where lightning strikes, and you vaporize yourself.

I wish someone would quote this post.

granted. but you will have to pay someone IRL a drink*

I wish for someonw to read the small text.

*terms and conditions apply. the drink must be more than $1

Granted. I read the small print. And I shall ignore it.

Have some water.

 

I wish my spaceplanes would actually reach orbit.

Granted, but you have no fuel left once you actually get there.

I wish I could have more money to buy games with.

Granted, but it's in Dolphinese currency.

 

I wish clouds and light pollution wouldn't be so common.

Granted, But you *may* have to move to Pluto. Transport costs not provided. Food not provided. Functional spacecraft *may be provided.  Warranty void if spacecraft exposed to space. Chances of spontaneous combustion are a bit below the 50/50 mark. Blah Blah Blah Blah...

I wish that we would JUST GO TO MARS ALREADY!!

Granted, but you get stuck on Mars and have to science the um... Excretements... Out of it to grow potatoes.

i wish that my wish gets horribly corrupted.

Granted, but we forget to bring life support during our rush.

I wish I had my own Warframe.

http://warframe.wikia.com/wiki/Warframes

Granted, but an April fools joke blows it up.

I wish the mods review stuff sooner.

Granted, but they review it for longer.

I wish for more time on spring break.

Granted, but for spring break every day you must break something.

i wish my wish gets horribly corrupted. (Experimenting)

Granted. (Hey, you were asking for a paradox!)

I wish for all moon-landing denialists to be brought to a nice, big, self-sustaining moon colony where they can live comfortably listening to Carl Sagan's calm voice and exploring in rovers and EVAs until they realize the moon really does exist, Earth is a sphere, and there is an unimaginable number of totally unknown worlds out there and it's awesome.

Edited April 2, 2016 by cubinator

Umm... Granted but um... The stuff gets horribly corrupted?...

i wish that rubics cube turn into spheres and that my wishes get horribly corrupted. (More experiments... For science!)

2 hours ago, max_creative said:

Umm... Granted but um... The stuff gets horribly corrupted?...

i wish that rubics cube turn into spheres and that my wishes get horribly corrupted. (More experiments... For science!)

Granted, and your wish gets corrupted by this: The 3 dimensions collapse into a 2 dimensional universe making every exising form of life dissapear (and rubiks cubes), then a black hole swallows everything and it ends and your wish gets corrupted by this: The 3 dimensions collapse into a 2 dimensional universe making every exising form of life dissapear (and rubiks cubes), then a black hole swallows everything and it ends and your wish gets corrupted by this: The 3 dimensions collapse into a 2 dimensional universe making every exising form of life dissapear (and rubiks cubes), then a black hole swallows everything and it ends and your wish gets corrupted by this:... (Paradox, I think)

 

Wish I could fly a real airplane by controlling the plane on KSP, and I wish my wish gets corrupted because I wish my wish get corrupted because...

mistake

Granted, but after plane crashes rise by 90%, people stop using airlines

I wish for a bagel with cream cheese
